hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas that Umm Sulaim asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) about a woman who sees in her dream something like a man sees. He said:"If water is released then let her perform Ghusl

chapter.ara-name: باب غُسْلِ الْمَرْأَةِ تَرَى فِي مَنَامِهَا مَا يَرَى الرَّجُلُ
chapter.eng-name: The Ghusl Of A Woman Who Sees Something In Her dream Like A Man Sees
